description: This file is a Dart source file defining the UI for the cart screen in a Flutter mobile application. It contains the CartScreen widget, which displays cart items, totals, and a button to proceed to payment, along with related sub-widgets (_CartRow and _TotalsCard).

classes.name: CartScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that represents the shopping cart screen, displaying cart items, restaurant info, totals, and navigation to payment.

classes.name: _CartRow
classes.description: A widget displaying individual cart items with quantity controls.

classes.name: _TotalsCard
classes.description: A widget summarizing subtotal, delivery fee, taxes, and total cost.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for CartScreen, constructing the UI based on cart state.

methods.name: _CartRow.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for a single cart item row, including quantity adjustment buttons.

methods.name: _TotalsCard.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the totals summary card.
